Articles.Content:
PLEASE DISREGARD, WRONG THREAD!  Do people prefer their ships painted (like Da Vinci's Combat Kit) or stock parts and colors?  This is for reference when sharing craft links in this Forum.

Edited April 8, 2018 by GillyMonster

If you post in the wrong section, just report your own post (upper right hand corner by the share icon) and a mod will move it for you.

 

Personally, I like the drab whites/greys of the stock textures.
